name: Patryk Zaslawski
profile_summary: Results-driven Manual QA Engineer (Mobile) with 8+ years of experience, specializing in mobile testing and API testing to ensure high-quality software delivery. Proficient in using tools such as **Postman**, **Swagger**, and proxy debugging tools including **Proxyman**, **Charles**, and **Fiddler** for comprehensive testing processes. Skilled in database management with experience in **MongoDB Compass** to enhance data handling capabilities. Adept in maintaining test documentation and performing functional testing and A/B testing to validate software performance. Strong collaborator with excellent communication skills, coupled with critical and analytical thinking abilities. Proven adaptability in fast-paced environments and effective time management to deliver projects on schedule.

experience.responsibilities:
Conducted thorough **API testing** on mobile platforms, utilizing tools such as **Postman** and **Swagger** to ensure functional accuracy and overall performance.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to document test strategies and results in **Jira** and **Confluence**, promoting transparency and effective communication.
Executed comprehensive **functional testing** for mobile applications, focusing on user stories and acceptance criteria, ensuring seamless user experiences.
Developed and maintained detailed **test documentation** to facilitate consistency and adherence to quality standards across the team.
Leveraged **proxy debugging tools** like **Charles** and **Fiddler** for in-depth analysis and debugging of API interactions, enhancing the reliability of mobile services.
Utilized **MongoDB Compass** for database verification, ensuring data integrity and accurate retrieval within mobile applications.
Implemented **A/B testing** strategies to analyze user interaction data, enhancing mobile application performance and user satisfaction.
Exercised strong **analytical thinking** and **problem-solving** skills to identify, track, and resolve defects efficiently, contributing to improved application quality.
Facilitated regular **SCRUM** meetings to ensure alignment with project timelines and foster effective collaboration within the QA team.
Demonstrated **attention to detail** and **adaptability** in a fast-paced environment, meeting project deadlines while maintaining high quality standards.
Managed time effectively to balance multiple testing projects, ensuring thorough testing coverage and prompt feedback to development teams.
Promoted a culture of continuous improvement by proactively identifying testing gaps and suggesting enhancements to the testing workflow.

Conducted thorough **mobile testing** on banking applications, ensuring adherence to functional specifications and exceptional user experiences.
Utilized **API testing** methodologies with tools like **Postman** and **Swagger** to validate RESTful and gRPC APIs, ensuring robust communication across the system.
Developed and executed **test documentation** strategies to detail testing processes, enhancing clarity and organization in the QA workflow.
Collaborated in a **SCRUM** environment, actively participating in sprint planning and retrospectives to improve team dynamics and project outcomes.
Applied **critical thinking** and **analytical thinking** skills to troubleshoot and resolve complex issues identified during testing phases.
Leveraged **proxy debugging tools** such as **Proxyman**, **Charles**, and **Fiddler** to intercept and analyze mobile traffic for deeper insights into application performance.
Managed defect tracking and reporting effectively through **Jira** and **Confluence**, facilitating communication between QA and development teams.
Executed **functional testing** with meticulous **attention to detail**, ensuring all aspects of the mobile applications function as intended under various scenarios.
Adapted testing strategies based on evolving project needs, demonstrating **adaptability** and excellent **time management** skills to meet tight deadlines.
Conducted **A/B testing** to evaluate user experience improvements and drive evidence-based decisions for application enhancements.
Engaged in continuous improvement processes by providing feedback and insights from **mobile testing**, fostering collaboration among cross-functional teams.
Documented test results and authored reports detailing findings, ensuring clear communication of issues and risk assessments to stakeholders.

Conducted **mobile testing** to ensure optimal functionality and performance of mobile applications across various devices.
Performed **API testing** utilizing tools like **Postman** and **Swagger** to validate RESTful services and confirm seamless integration between mobile and backend systems.
Utilized **proxy debugging tools** such as **Proxyman**, **Charles**, and **Fiddler** to diagnose issues and enhance mobile application performance through efficient traffic analysis.
Worked closely with databases including **MongoDB** to ensure data integrity and effective communication between mobile apps and backend databases, optimizing access patterns and query performance.
Collaborated within **SCRUM** teams, participating in sprint planning and retrospective meetings using tools like **Jira** and **Confluence** for maintaining high standards in test documentation and project visibility.
Executed **A/B testing** strategies to assess user experience across different mobile application versions, guiding product decisions based on analytical insights.
Engaged in **functional testing** to identify bugs and ensure compliance with business requirements, enhancing user satisfaction and app reliability.
Demonstrated **critical thinking** and **problem-solving skills** to analyze issues and propose efficient solutions during manual testing phases.
Communicated effectively with cross-functional teams to foster collaboration and coordinate efforts, ensuring alignment in development and testing processes.
Maintained a keen **attention to detail** while developing test cases and executing test plans, ensuring thorough coverage of requirements and mitigating risk.
Exhibited **adaptability** in managing priorities and **time management** skills to meet project deadlines and deliver quality results.
Analyzed test results meticulously, providing actionable feedback to development teams to guide product improvements and enhance overall application quality across **9 mobile platforms**.

skills:
**API Technologies**:
	Postman, Swagger, REST & gRPC APIs

**Databases**:
	PostgreSQL (Fintech), MySQL (Healthcare), MongoDB (Gaming), MongoDB Compass, Redis

**Cloud & Infrastructure**:
	AWS (ECS, Lambda, RDS, S3), Azure (App Services, Blob, SQL)

**Backend Frameworks**:
	Python (FastAPI, Django, Flask), SQLAlchemy, Pydantic, Celery, Spring Boot

**Frontend Frameworks**:
	Angular (1–16), React (15–18), Next.js, Vue.js (2/3), Blazor

**Cloud Functions**:
	Docker, Kubernetes

**Other**:
	Keycloak (OIDC, RBAC), JWT, OAuth2, Let’s Encrypt, Nginx, Certbot, Jira, Confluence, SCRUM, test documentation, A/B testing, functional testing, critical thinking, analytical thinking, collaboration, problem-solving, communication, attention to detail, adaptability, time management, proxy debugging tools, Proxyman, Charles, Fiddler, mobile testing, API testing
